data.name: World of Warships — Huanghe Pack
data.detailed_description:
Like a destroyer on steroids, cruiser Huanghe is armed with Smoke Generator, six torpedo tubes, the choice between Hydroacoustic Search or Torpedo Reload Booster, a devastating main battery of six 152 mm guns, and a bad attitude.

Key features:

  • Low detectability
  • Access to the Crawling Smoke Generator consumable
  • High AA defense efficiency
  • Low survivability.

This package includes:

  • Huanghe, Pan-Asian Tier VI Cruiser
  • Steam commemorative flag
  • Port slot

If you already have this ship in your Port, you will receive 2376 doubloons as compensation.

You will be able to use this DLC only if you play from the game account created on Steam.

data.supported_languages:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 x64 SP1
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.66 GHz, Core i3 2.5 GHz, AMD Athlon II X2 2.7 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 440/630, AMD Radeon HD 7660
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 43 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10.1
  • Additional Notes: 1280×720
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 x64 SP1 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.4 GHz, AMD FX 6350 3.9 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660, AMD Radeon R9 270x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 45 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11
  • Additional Notes: 1920×1080
